document_data.name: The Market
document_data.mainbody: '''The Market''' was a large open area in [[Silverymoon]] set aside for merchants to sell their wares. It was a very popular area for folk of the city to frequent in the warmer months of the year.
document_data.Location: The Market was located in [[Northbank]]. It began at [[Hunter's Gate]] on the northern wall and divided Northbank by stretching south all the way to the Docks. The [[High Palace]], the temples, and most of the homes of the nobles were located east of the Market.
